name: Little world
description:
It's a little world where you can walk around and make some friends. Meet everyone in the town and check out the beach.

This a fraction of what I wanted to make, oh well. Hope you enjoy what’s there.

How to play
  • Walk around with the arrow keys or using your gamepad's joystick
  • Talk to friends or drag boxes by pressing X or Button 1
  • That's it!
